opModes.name: TRANSPARENTIZE
opModes.desc: Makes image transparent/translucent based on lightness

opModes.name: TRANSPARENTIZE (desat.)
opModes.desc: Desaturates images, adds transparency based on lightness

opModes.name: RE-PRINT ENGRAVING
opModes.desc: Desaturates images, reduces values to (mostly) black and white

opModes.name: CONVERT BLACK & WHITE TO TWO COLOURS
opModes.desc: Colours a black and white image based on configuration
opModes.nameConfirmation: Convert B&W Images to Two Colours

opModes.name: COPY E-BOOK IMAGES
opModes.desc: Pulls all images from an input e-book (.epub)
